Title: The Black Dahlia
Overview: In 1940s Los Angeles, two former boxers-turned-cops must grapple with corruption, narcissism, stag films and family madness as they pursue the killer of an aspiring young actress.
Tagline: Inspired by the most notorious unsolved murder in California history.
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Davis-Films, Signature Pictures, Linson Entertainment, Art Linson Productions, Millennium Films, Equity Pictures Medienfonds GmbH & Co. KG III, Nu Image Entertainment GmbH
Cast: Josh Hartnett, Scarlett Johansson, Aaron Eckhart
